All your events, all on ConfoZone

One platform to create, manage & host your virtual events.

Use the most customizable hybrid events platform to deliver immersive and interactive experiences


Why to use ConfoZone?

  • Simple to use and easily scalable
  • Round the clock support
  • Industrial standard security
  • Enterprise level experience for all
  • Interactive web meeting tools
  • Affordable, no hidden pricing structure
  • Deep integration with ConfoZone's ecosystem and other major third-party services
  • Powerful software, hardware, & services that blend ease of use with deep customization so you can craft the event you envision across the entire event lifecycle.

TRUSTED BY TEAMS AT

Host virtually physical events

Welcome users in the lobby with a personalised check-in. Allow speakers to engage with the audience via interactive tools. There's even a dedicated area where sponsors present themselves. Last but not least: detailed reports are available to organisers to calculate ROI and monitor attendance. Your next online or hybrid event will feel virtually physical but from the comfort of everybody's home.

  • Personalised check-in
  • Advanced engagement tools
  • Elaborate sponsor booths
  • Attend from anywhere

Enjoy next-level networking

Networking is one of the main reasons why someone shows up for events. That’s why we’ve gone all-in on bringing in-person networking online. Our network carousel and smart matchmaking make sure users connect with similar-minded people. 1-on-1 or group meetings are easily arranged and valuable connections exported with a single click.

  • Innovative network carousel
  • Smart matchmaking of users
  • Easily arrange 1–on-1 or group meetings
  • Physical networking made virtual
